name: Sanchez Art Center
description: Nonprofit arts center with three exhibition galleries and annual juried shows. Free admission. Home to the Art Guild of Pacifica.
fullDescription: Nonprofit arts center with three exhibition galleries and annual juried shows. Free admission. Home to the Art Guild of Pacifica.
